SEARCH

Rev's Point of Sales System

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Client
    The `Client` class provides an interface for mutual exclusion across multiple POS order terminals and their communication with the database.
    Database
    The `Database` class handles the connection to a PostgreSQL database and provides methods to execute SQL queries and commands.
    Employee
    The Employee class represents the graphical user interface for employees.
    employeeCmds
    Class to handle various operations related to employees, such as retrieving menu items and submitting orders.
    EmployeeDelete
    The EmployeeDelete class represents the panel for deleting items from the order in the employee interface.
    EmployeeSubmit
    The EmployeeSubmit class represents the panel for submitting an order.
    ExcessReport
    Generates an excess report based on database data.
    GUI
    The `GUI` class contains the main method to launch the application.
    LogInGUI
    The `LogInGUI` class represents the login interface for the POS system.
    managerCmds
    Class to handle various operations related to managers, such as managing inventory, menu items, and orders.
    ManagerGUI
    ManagerGUI class represents the graphical user interface for a restaurant management system.
    ManagerInventory
    ManagerInventory class represents a JPanel for managing inventory items.
    ManagerMenuItems
     
    ManagerOrderHistory
    ManagerOrderHistory class represents a JPanel for managing order history in a restaurant system.
    ManagerTrends
    ManagerTrends class represents a JPanel for managing various trend reports in a restaurant system.
    MenuSection
    The MenuSection class represents a panel for displaying a section of the menu.
    OrderTrend
    Generates an order trend report based on menu IDs and counts within a specified date range.
    ProdUsage
    Generates a produce usage chart based on negative inventory changes within a specified date range.
    RestockReport
    Generates a restock report showing ingredients that are below their minimum amount.
    SalesReport
    Generates a sales report based on orders within a specified date range.
    Server
    A server implementation that handles client requests for mutual exclusion.
    sqlObjects
    The sqlObjects class contains several nested static classes that neatly package data to be recived from the database.
    sqlObjects.Inventory
    Represents the inventory of ingredients in the database.
    sqlObjects.Menu
    Represents the menu items in the database.
    sqlObjects.MenuItemIngredients
    Represents the ingredients of a menu item.
    sqlObjects.OrderingTrendReport
    Represents the ordering trend report in the database.
    sqlObjects.OrderList
    Represents the list of orders in the database.
    sqlObjects.ProductUsageChart
    Represents the product usage chart in the database.
